gov.usgs.locator

Class PhaseID

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.PhaseID

  • public class PhaseID
extends java.lang.Object
    Associate theoretical seismic phases with observed seismic picks.
    Author:
    Ray Buland

        ttLocal - Travel time information for a local implementation

    • Method Detail

      • doID

        public boolean doID(double otherWeight,
                    double stickyWeight,
                    boolean reID,
                    boolean reWeight)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Driver for the phase identification.
        Parameters:
        otherWeight - Weight for phases that don't match the current phase identification or the current phase group (higher weights make changing to an "other" phase easier)
        stickyWeight - Weight for an exact match (higher weights make changing the current identification harder.
        reID - If true, do the full phase re-identification, if false try not to change identifications
        reWeight - If true, update the residual weights
        Returns:
        True if any used pick in the group has changed significantly
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On an illegal source depth
